resources.string: Vumela i-%1$s ukuthi ikubonise izingcezu kusukela kunoma iluphi uhlelo lokusebenza
Vumela i-%1$s ukuthi ibonise izingcezu ze-%2$s?

"Ulungele ukuqala ukusebenzisa ifoni yakho.
Ungavala ukuzulazula kokuthinta uphinde usebenzise izinkinobho ukuze ubuyele emuva, Ekhaya uphinde ushintshe izinhlelo zokusebenza. "Hamba kokuthi Izilungiselelo
Siyabonga ngempendulo. Lokhu kuzosiza ukwazisa amathiphu azayo.
I-%1$s ngeke isebenze ngaphandle kokuthi unike amandla amasevisi we-Google Play.
I-%1$s ngeke ize iqalise ngaphandle kwamasevisi we-Google Play, angekho kusukela kudivayisi yakho.
%1$s inenkinga ngamasevisi e-Google Play. Sicela uzame futhi.
%1$s ngeke isebenze ngaphandle kwamasevisi e-Google Play, angasekelwa idivayisi yakho.
I-%1$s ngeke ize iqalise ngaphandle kokuthi ubuyekeze i-Google Play.
I-%1$s ngeke ize iqalise ngaphandle kwamasevisi we-Google Play, okwamanje abuyekezwayo.
Kudingeka inguqulo entsha yamasevisi we-Google Play. Izozibuyekeza ngokwayo maduze.
Ukuze ubone amavidiyo nezithombe, zama ukuxhuma ku-Wi-Fi noma ukushintsha amanethiwekhi
Ukuxhumeka kwe-inthanethi kuyadingeka ukuze kuboniswe amavidiyo nezithombe
Shintsha izinhlelo zokusebenza, shintsha izilungiselelo ngokushesha, ngxila kangcono, nokuningi
Thola izinhlelo zokusebenza, hamba hamba kufoni yakho, nokuningi
Kushintshwe kusukela ku-iPhoneⓇ? Thola izinhlelo zokusebenza, hamba kufoni yakho, nokuningi
Khuluma nomsizi wakho, khomba umculo Ngokudlala Manje, nokuningi
Thatha ukuma ngobude okuhle, swayipha phakathi kwamamodeli, nokuningi
Thumela izithombe, yenza amakholi evidiyo, uphinde wabelane ngezithombe
Vula ikhamera ngokushesha, hlola izaziso, nokuningi
Landela isikhathi sesikrini sakho, setha ishejuli yokunqamula, nokuningi
Bona izinhlelo zokusebenza ezimbili kanye, hlela izinhlelo zokusebenza ngamafolda, nokuningi
Thatha amanothi, khokha nge-Pixel, bese uthole izindaba zakamuva
Ividiyo mayelana nokuthinta okusha kusanda kubuya
Ukuze ubuyele emuva esikrinini sangaphambilini, swayiphela kuya maphakathi kusuka kwesokunxele kuya kwesokudla
Ividiyo mayelana nokuthinta okusha ukuya ekhaya
"Swayiphela phezulu kusuka phansi kwesikrini sakho. Lokhu kuthinta kuhlala kukusa esikrinini sasekhaya."
Ividiyo mayelana nokuthinta okusha kokubuka konke
Swayiphela phezulu kusuka phansi kwesikrini sakho bese ubambe
Yenza ama-Pixel amaningi. Buka amavidiyo nokuningi.
Thatha ukuma ngobude, thola ishothi enhle kakhulu, nokuningi
Thumela izithombe, yenza amakholi evidiyo, nokuningi

Swayiphela phezulu kusukela ngaphansi kwesikrini sakho ukuze ubone izinhlelo zakho zokusebenza zakamuva. Uzophinda ubone umugqa wezinhlelo zokusebenza eziqageliwe ngaphansi. Swayiphela phezulu futhi ukuze ubone zonke izinhlelo zakho zokusebenza.

"Ukuze ungeze uhlelo lokusebenza esikrinini sakho sasekhaya, thinta futhi uhudule uhlelo lokusebenza.
Ukuze ususe uhlelo lokusebenza, thinta futhi ubambe uhlelo lokusebenza, bese ulihudulele phezulu kwesikrini sakho."

"Qalisa ngalezi zinhlelo zokusebenza: - I-Google Play Isitolo: Hlola uphinde ulande izinhlelo zokusebenza - Izithombe ze-Google: Thola, londoloza, uphinde wabelane ngezithombe - I-Google Keep: Thwebula amanothi, uhlu, nokuningi"

"Swayiphela phansi kusukela phezulu kwesikrini sakho ukuze ubone izaziso. Ukuze usule isaziso, siswayiphele ngakwesokunxele noma ngakwesokudla.
Ukuze ubone olunye ulwazi mayelana nesaziso, sithinte uphinde usibambe."

"Swayiphela phansi kusukela phezulu kwe-Pixel yakho ukuze uvule izilungiselelo ezisheshayo. Swayiphela phansi futhi ukuze uthole izilungiselelo eziningi.
Ukuze uvule noma uvale isilungiselelo, sithephe. Ukuze ubone izinketho eziningi zesilungiselelo, sithinte uphinde usibambe."

"Uma usebenzisa ifoni yakho kodwa ufuna ukuhlala ugxilile, ungamisa izaziso zingaveli.
Hlola izilawuli ezintsha kokuthi Ungaphazamisi."

"Thinta futhi ubambe umbhalo ukuze ubone izenzo ezitholakalayo, njengokwenza ukubhuka kwendawo yokudlela.
Ungenza lokhu kusuka kunoma yiluphi uhlelo lokusebenza. Kusebenza ngisho noma ushintsha phakathi kwezinhlelo zokusebenza"

"Amathiphu amaningi nosekelo kuyatholakala noma kunini. Vele uye kuzilungiselelo > amathiphu nosekelo.
Ungahlola amathiphu, uphequlule ama-athikili osizo, noma uxhumane nethimba le-Pixel."
Ukuze uvule lesi sici, thepha inkinobho engezansi.
Ukuze uvule lesi sici, thepha inkinobho engezansi.
Ukuze ukhulume nomsizi wakho we-Google noma kunini (nanoma isikrini sivaliwe), shutheka ngokushesha uhhafu ongaphansi wefoni yakho, bese uyadedela.

"Umsizi wakho we-Google yindlela esheshayo nelula yokuthola izimpendulo iphinde yenze izinto zenzeke ku-Pixel yakho.
Ukuze ukhulume nomsizi wakho, shutheka ngokushesha uhhafu ongaphansi wefoni yakho, bese uyadedela uphinde uthi:
- Unini umcimbi wami wokuqala kusasa? - Engeza okokuxubha amazinyo kuhlu lwami lokuthenga - Asiye ekhaya"

"Ubona isilwane esihle, isitshalo esihlukile, noma isici sokubonisa izwe esithandekayo osinaka ngeso lakho? Sebenzisa ilensi yeGoogle ukuze ufunde kabanzi.
Vele uvule ikhamera yakho, thinta futhi ubambe ku-viewfinder, bese uthephe into oyithandayo."
Ukuze usebenzise okudlala manje, buyekeza amasevisi e-Pixel Ambient.
Ukuze uvule lesi sici, thepha inkinobho engezansi.
Okudlala manje kubonisa ngokuzenzakalela ulwazi lwengoma lwanoma iyiphi ingoma edlalayo, noma ngabe ukuphi.
I-Pixel yakho ibona ngokuzenzakalela izinombolo zefoni, amakheli, ama-imeyili, amabhakhodi, namakhodi e-QR. Vele uvule ikhamera yakho, uyibhekise, bese uvumela ikhamera yakho yenze umsebenzi.

"Kwesinye isikhathi ufuna ukuthatha isithombe, bese ividiyo bese okunye okuhluke kancane.
Ukuze ushintshe phakathi kwamamodi, vele uvule isitholi sokubuka sekhamera uphinde uswayiphele ngakwesokunxele noma ngakwesokudla. Thepha Okuningi ukuze uthole ezinye izinketho."

"Kumodi yokuma ngobude, i-Pixel ifiphalisa ingemuva ukuze uthole ukubukeka okuhle, okuphrofeshinali. Izame uphinde uzibonele ngokwakho.
Vele uvule ikhamera yakho, swayipha kusukela kwesokunxele ukuya kwesokudla, futhi uzobese ulungele ukuqhubeka."

"Cindezela uphinde ubambe inkinobho yamandla, bese uthepha isithombe-skrini. Presto, usanda kuthatha isithombe-skrini.
Ukuze udwebe kusithombe-skrini, thepha okuthi Hlela kusaziso esivelayo."
Ividiyo mayelana nokukhetha isikhathi esilungile ngesithombe esiphuma phambili

"Njalo uma uthatha isithombe, i-Pixel ilondoloza isithombe esingeziwe noma ezimbili ukuze uthole ishothi elihle kakhulu.
1. Yenza isiqinisekiso sokuthi Ukunyakaza [icon_span] kuvuliwe, bese uthatha isithombe sakho 2. Uma ubuke isithombe, vele uswayiphele phezulu kusukela ngaphansi 3. Thepha \"Amashothi akulesi sithombe\" ukuze ubuyekeze ezinye izithombe"
Khetha isikhathi esilungile ngesithombe esiphuma phambili
Ividiyo mayelana nokuthatha isithombe ozishuthe sona seqembu

"Isithombe ozishuthe sona seqembu sikunikeza isikhala esiningi kusithombe sakho sabangani noma ukubukeka—akudingeki i-selfie stick.
1. Shintshela kukhamera ebheke phambili [icon_span] 2. Thepha kabili isikrini noma ncinza iminwe yakho eseduze nokuhlehlisa isithombe"
"1. Vula ingxoxo kuhlelo lokusebenza lwemilayezo 2. Thepha okuthi bhala [icon_span] ngakwesokunxele lapho uthayipha khona umlayezo wakho 3. Khetha lesi sithombe esihle kakhulu, i-emoji, noma isitika"

"Akukho okuhlula ingxoxo yobuso nobuso nabangani bakho abasondelene kakhulu nomndeni. Yingakho i-Pixel yenza ukushaya kwevidiyo kube lula nge-Google Duo.
1. Vula uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-Google Duo 2. Sesha oxhumana naye 3. Qala ikholi yevidiyo ngokuthepha okukodwa, noma mumeme ukuze alande i-Google Duo
Abangani bakho kumafoni e-iOSⓇ nakumathebulethi bangasebenzisa i-Google Duo nabo."
"1. Vula izithombe ze-Google 2. Thinta uphinde ubambe ukuze ukhethe isithombe 3. Khetha izithombe eziningi, uma ungathanda 4. Thepha okuthi Yabelana [icon_span] 5. Khetha abantu ozokwabelana nabo"
Ividiyo emayelana nokuthumela umbhalo kusukela kukhompuyutha yakho

"Ungathumela umlayezo kusukela kukhompuyutha yakho usebenzisa Imilayezo ye-Android. Ukuze uqalise, hamba kuhlelo lwakho lokusebenza lwemilayezo uphinde ukhethe \"Imilayezo yewebhu”[icon_span] kumenyu.
Ngokungeziwe ekulayezeni, ungathumela izitika, i-emoji, uphinde unamathisele izithombe."
Ungahlola isikhathi, izaziso, nokuningi ngokuthepha kabili isikrini sakho.
Cindezela inkinobho yamandla kabili kusukela kunoma isiphi isikrini ukuze ushintshele kukhamera yakho ngokushesha.
Ukuze ushintshe ungene uphinde uphume kumodi yezithombe ozishutha sona kukhamera yakho, jikisa kabili uma ukuhlelo lokusebenza.
Ividiyo emayelana nokuswayipha izigxivizo zeminwe zezaziso
"Ungahlola izaziso zakho ngokuswayiphela phansi kunzwa yezigxivizo zeminwe ngemuva kwefoni yakho. Swayipha futhi ukuze ubone izilungiselelo ezisheshayo."
Swayipha izigxivizo zeminwe ukuze uthole izaziso
Ukuze ushintshe ngokushesha izinhlelo zokusebenza, skrola kusuka kwesokunxele kuya kwesokudla phansi kwesikrini. Khulula ukuze uvule uhlelo lokusebenza.

"Ukukhanya kwasebusuku kufiphaza isikrini sakho ngoku-amber. Lokhu kungenza kubelula ukubheka esikrinini sakho noma ufunde ngokufiphele, futhi ingakusiza ukuthi ulale kalula.
Ungavula noma uvale ngokushesha ukukhanya kwasebusuku kuzilungiselelo ezisheshayo. Noma, vele uthinte futhi ubambe ukuze usethe ishejuli."
Ividiyo mayelana nokusetha isikhathi sokulala ngomoya phansi

"Setha ishejuli yanjalo ebusuku ukuze unqamule kusukela kufoni yakho.
1. Vula i-Digital Wellbeing [icon_span] 2. Thepha Umoya phansi 3. Setha ishejuli yakho yokuthi Umoya phansi
Uma sekucishe kuyisikhathi sokulala, isikrini sakho sizoshintsha umbala, futhi Ukungaphazamisi kuzovimbela izaziso kusukela ekukuphazamiseni ekulaleni kwakho."
Setha ishejuli yesikhathi sokulala ngomoya phansi
Ngokuphendulela ku-Shhh, vele ubeke ifoni yakho ibheke phansi ukuze uvule okuthi Ungaphazamisi bese umise izaziso nemisindo.

Hlola ideshibhodi yokuphila kahle kudijithali kuzilungiselelo ngesifinyezo sesikhathi sesikrini sakho, nezibali-sikhathi zezinhlelo zakho zokusebenza kuzinhlelo zokusebenza ongathanda ukuzisebenzisa kancane.
Ividiyo mayelana nokuhlela izinhlelo zakho zokusebenza ngamafolda

"Dala amafolda ukuze ulandele kalula izinhlelo zakho zokusebenza.
Ukuze udale ifolda, hudula uhlelo lokusebenza phezu kolunye uhlelo lokusebenza. Ungaqamba ifolda entsha.
Ungahudulela izinhlelo zokusebenza eziningi kwifolda, noma uhudule uhlelo lokusebenza ulukhiphe kuyo."
Ividiyo emayelana nokusebenzisa izinhlelo zokusebenza ezingu-2 ngesikhathi esisodwa

"Ungasebenzisa izinhlelo zokusebenza ezimbili ngesikhathi esifanayo ngokusetha ukuhlukanisa isikrini kufoni yakho. Vumela kuqale ukwenza imisebenzi eminingi.
1. Swayiphela phezulu kusukela ngaphansi kwesikrini sakho ukuze ubone izinhlelo zakho zokusebenza zakamuva 2. Thinta uphinde ubambe isithonjana sohlelo lokusebenza esingaphezulu kwesikrini 3. Thepha ukuhlukanisa isikrini
Hambisa isihlukanisi ngaphezulu nangaphansi njengoba kudingeka. Iswayiphe isuke uma usuqedile."
Bona izinhlelo zokusebenza ezimbili ngesikhathi esisodwa

"Umsizi wakho angakusiza wenze izenzo ngokushesha. Ukuze ukhulume nomsizi wakho, shesha ushutheke uhhafu ongaphansi wefoni yakho. Bese uzama ukuthi:
1. \"Thatha izithombe ozishuthe sona\" 2. \"Thatha isithombe-skrini\" 3. \"Vula i-flashlight\""
Sebenzisa umsizi wakho we-Google ngosizo ngemisebenzi yangemihla

"Ngohlelo lokusebenza le-Google Keep, ungathwebula ngokushesha okucabangayo. Engeza amanothi, uhlu, izithombe, nomsindo.
Futhi ungasetha izikhumbuzi ukuze ukhumbule ukuqedela imisebenzi yakho. Futhi i-Keep yenza kubelula ukwabelana ngamanothi nabangani nomndeni."

"Thola ukufakwa okuphezulu, kuzindaba ezenzeka manje, zasendaweni nezomhlaba jikelele.
Ngokuthepha nje, bona izihloko eziphezulu kusukela kumithombo yakho eyintandokazi. Uzobona umugqa wesikhathi wezikhathi zakho ezingukhiye, imibono, ukuhlaziywa, nokuningi ukuze sikusize uqonde indaba ngokujula kwesendlalelo."

"I-Google Pay indlela esheshayo yokukhokha kumamiliyoni ezitolo usebenzisa nje ifoni yakho ye-Pixel. Nakhu ukuthi kanjani:
1. Engeza ikhadi ku-Google Pay 2. Bheka isimbuli engaxhumani nalutho[icon_span] ekuphumeni 3. Vula ifoni yakho uphinde uyibambe eduze kwetheminali 4. Linda uze ubone umaka wokuhlola
Yilokho nje!"

"Ukuze ufinyelele okuthi Khetha ukuze ukhulume noma ukukhuliswa, swayiphela phezulu kusukela ngaphansi kwesikrini ngeminwe emibili.
Ukuze ushintshe phakathi kwezinhlelo zokusebenza zokufinyeleleka, swayiphela phezulu ngeminwe emibili uphinde ubambe.
Ungasebenzisa lokhu kuthinta ngemuva kokuthi uqedele ukusetha."
